name: markdown_previewer
description: A markdown previewer written in ReactJs

scripts.build:scripts: browserify -x jquery -x bootstrap -x keymirror -x react -x react-dom -x react-codemirror -x codemirror -x marked -x codemirror/mode/gfm/gfm -x flux -x highlight.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-0 ] uglifyify ]  src/main.js -o dist/scripts/main.js
scripts.build:vendor: browserify -t [ uglifyify ] -r jquery -r bootstrap -r keymirror -r react -r react-dom -r react-codemirror -r codemirror -r codemirror/mode/gfm/gfm -r marked -r flux -r highlight.js -o dist/scripts/vendor.js && cat node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css node_modules/codemirror/lib/codemirror.css node_modules/highlight.js/styles/monokai.css | postcss --local-plugins -u cssnano -o dist/styles/bundle.css
scripts.build:styles: npm run cleanuptmp && npm run createtmp && npm run build:scss && npm run build:css && npm run cleanuptmp
scripts.watch:js: onchange 'src/*.js' 'src/**/*.js' -e src/test/**/*.js -e dist/**/*.js -- npm run build:scripts
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npm run setupfolder && npm run build:vendor && npm run build:html && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles
scripts.start: npm run build && run-p watch:* -s server

author: Greg Smith
